meta.goal: Full Revamp pass v1 — stable UX, contributor pipeline, gentle onboarding, memory-first

copy.hero_title: Welcome — this space adapts to you.
copy.hero_sub: We’ll keep it calm, go one step at a time, and remember what helps so you don’t have to.

onboarding.wow_open: Hey! I’m your quiet co-pilot — I’ll make the next step obvious and keep the pace gentle.
onboarding.memory_prompt: Turn on memory so I can keep your preferred tone, pace, and topics for next time?
anchors: We’ll take this one line at a time.
If a thought loops, we’ll park it and return when you choose.
Short steps are still steps forward.
onboarding.ocd_support_note: Gentle reframes and labeling (‘this is an intrusive thought’) help reduce urgency. We can practice that together, only if you want.

ux_prompts.start_tip: Tap Start — I’ll do the heavy lifting and keep choices minimal.
ux_prompts.contribute_tip: When you finish, use ‘Save & Send’ — I’ll prepare a privacy-safe package with a receipt.
